titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, Undated

mods.tableOfContents: This tape is a mixture of various war dance songs and stomp dance songs poorly spliced together. Most are unidentified, some are incomplete, and the sound quality varies. The only name mentioned is Blaine Faw Faw.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
